channel.title: GFR on From Fish to Physician
channel.description: Recent content in GFR on From Fish to Physician

item.title: Filtration-reabsorption: the central renal paradox
item.description: In this post… How the kidney evolved to filter first and reabsorb later How we came to know how the kidney works in this way It is so obvious! ‘One never notices what has been done; one can only see what remains to be done.’ — Marie Curie As facts become established dogma, it becomes almost impossible to conceive of a time when they were not known.
